alert.title: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 11:01AM CST until further notice by NWS Central Illinois
alert.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Illinois River near Havana affecting Cass...Fulton and Mason Counties Illinois River at Beardstown affecting Brown...Cass...Morgan and Schuyler Counties The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. The Flood Warning continues for The Illinois River near Havana. * Until further notice. * At 1045 AM Thursday the stage was 14.2 feet. * Flood stage is 14.0 feet. * Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 16.4 feet by early Tuesday morning then begin falling. Fld Observed Forecast 6AM Location Stg Stg Day Time Fri Sat Sun Illinois River Havana 14 14.2 Thu 11 AM 14.8 15.5 15.9
alert.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternate route. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/ilx.
